'''Sennight Gauntlet''' is a system in [[Genius Invokation TCG]] unlocked at [[Player Level]] 2.

Sennight Gauntlet Rewards can be earned by winning [[Guest Challenge]]s, matchmaking in [[Co-Op Mode]], or [[Arena of Champions]].

==Rewards==
Sennight Gauntlet Rewards are refreshed each Monday, and the weekly rewards for the Sennight Gauntlet will be determined based on the Player Level at that time:
